title: FS: one of these Ames (HAC) caption flaw T206's

posts.post_title: FS: one of these Ames (HAC) caption flaw T206's
posts.post_content:
I'm looking to sell one of these Ames with a caption flaw and keep the other one. There are 8 total examples of this Ames caption flaw that I know of and have documented.

Prices are for a paypal f&f payment and include shipping to a US address.

A=$110
B=$135
